sections.heading: The commission shall adopt rules pursuant to ss
sections.text: 120.536(1) and 120.54 to implement the provisions of this chapter. The commission shall ensure minimum and uniform standards of excellence, performance of duties, and maintenance of records so as to provide useful and adequate information to the state

sections.heading: for delivery of human remains after death prohibited.
sections.text: for delivery of human remains after death prohibited.

sections.heading: As used in this part, the term:(1)“Anatomical board” means the anatomical board of the state headquartered at the University of Florida Health Science Center
sections.text: (2)“Cremated remains” has the same meaning as provided in s. 497.005.(3)“Final disposition” has the same meaning as provided in s. 497.005.(4)
